backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor types for residents, vitals, medication, ADL, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and directory responses, and initializes authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing all frontend files and their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v46.md: Guide outlining verification steps, deployment process, smoke tests, and troubleshooting for rolling back to version 46.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light/dark modes using OKLCH values and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting app version, metadata, icons, and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, icons, theme colors, and display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app with auth gate and query provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Auth gate that initializes Internet Identity and shows a login screen or protected content based on identity state.
Logo component that attempts multiple URL variants for the brand image and falls back to initials if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Defines the main app shell with header, navigation, routed content, and footer, including sign‑out handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Renders the primary navigation bar with active‑route highlighting for the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Provides a dialog for creating a new resident with extensive form state, validation, and nested field handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Modal form for creating ADL records with validation, identity checks, and submission via mutation.
Displays, sorts, and deletes ADL records, showing placeholders and empty-state UI.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Displays a dialog for editing resident details, supporting dynamic lists of physicians and responsible persons.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Modal form for adding MAR records tied to a resident’s active medications with validation and mutation calls.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Lists, sorts, and allows deletion of MAR records with date/time formatting and empty-state UI.
Dialog form for adding a resident medication with dynamic times, validation, and callback-based submission.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Shows a resident summary card with status, metrics, profile navigation, and delete confirmation.
Renders the resident management section header with an action button to add new residents.
Provides room filtering and sorting controls for the resident list.
Displays residents in a card grid layout with empty‑state handling.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Renders tabs for filtering residents by All, Active, or Discharged status.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Form dialog for entering daily vital signs, validating inputs, creating a vitals record, and submitting it via a mutation.
Lists recorded vitals for a resident with sorting, status indicators, and delete functionality using queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: UI component that displays required missing reference materials with categorized lists and a link to the full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides centralized factory functions for generating scoped React Query keys for resident-related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthCheck.ts: Runs a timed health check against the backend using an anonymous actor and exposes reachability status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages ICP Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login/logout actions, and restoring identities across reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains all app-level React Query hooks for user profiles, residents directory, and vitals/records operations using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom light/dark theme CSS variables, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports static branding info including facility name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the residents dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, and backend interactions.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents based on ID.
Defines resident profile interfaces and fallback mock data when backend data is unavailable.
Contains mock resident directory entries with basic demographics and counts.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Provides helper functions to calculate and format a resident’s age from a birthdate.
Maps backend resident types to lightweight UI view models, including age calculation and room formatting helpers.
Provides filtering, sorting, KPI calculations, and room extraction utilities for resident view models.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays and edits a resident’s profile with tabs for vitals, MAR, ADLs, and medications, using backend or mock data.
Renders a print‑optimized resident profile report including demographics and medications.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Renders a reference checklist page outlining required screenshots and design assets for recreating the UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, clearing, and managing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, existing features, known issues, and build context.
